heading: kid l'orange
subheading: irish peace treaty aside, there are still plenty of englishmen with orange sympathies and now, thanks to a 5-year-old girl, they may have found a novel way of literally wearing their favorite color. after gulping down 1.5 liters per day of sunny delight, a popular fruit drink in old blighty, the wee lass saw her face and hands turn orange. turns out that the drink, while harmless, contains a lot of beta carotene, which did the trick. procter & gamble, maker of sunny delight, suggested that the girl try slipping in a glass of milk now and then.
author: wired staff
